TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit WebPartDisplayMode extends System.Object

summary.span: 為 Web 組件頁面可以進入的多種顯示模式，定義通用的屬性集。

span.span: Defines a common set of properties for the several display modes that a Web Parts page can enter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 組件頁面可以輸入數個不同的顯示模式。A Web Parts page can enter several different display modes. 在每一種顯示模式，Web 組件的使用者介面 (UI) 的特定項目會隱藏或顯示和特定類型的使用者修改的頁面啟用或停用。In each display mode, certain elements of the Web Parts user interface (UI) are either hidden or displayed, and certain kinds of user modifications to a page are either enabled or disabled. 控制項包含中 Web 組件控制項集合，可用的顯示模式的實作和管理頁面的顯示模式。The control contains the implementation for the display modes that are available in the Web Parts control set, and manages the display modes for a page. 下表列出欄位代表的可用顯示模式。The following table lists fields that represent the available display modes. |顯示模式Display mode|描述Description| |------------------|-----------------| ||讓使用者檢視頁面的標準模式中，會顯示 Web 組件控制項和 UI 項目。Displays Web Parts controls and UI elements in the normal mode in which end users view a page.| ||顯示區域的 UI 項目，並讓使用者拖曳 Web 組件的控制項，以變更頁面的配置。Displays zone UI elements and enables users to drag Web Parts controls to change the layout of a page.| ||顯示特殊編輯 UI 項目，並讓終端使用者編輯頁面上的控制項。Displays special editing UI elements and enables end users to edit the controls on a page.| ||顯示特殊目錄 UI 項目，並可讓使用者加入和移除頁面控制項。Displays special catalog UI elements and enables end users to add and remove page controls.| ||顯示特殊連接 UI 項目，並可讓使用者連接 Web 組件控制項。Displays special connections UI elements and enables end users to connect Web Parts controls.| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何宣告式 Web 組件頁面上的顯示模式使用。The following code examples demonstrate the declarative use of display modes on a Web Parts page. 每一種顯示模式，由 Web 組件控制項集合實作中，衍生自類別。Each of these display modes, as implemented by the Web Parts control set, is derived from the class. 這個程式碼範例包含四個部分：This code example has four parts: - 自訂控制項。A custom control. - 與區域裝載自訂控制項的網頁。A Web page with a zone to host the custom control. - 使用者控制項，可讓使用者變更網頁上的顯示模式。A user control that enables users to change display modes on the Web page. - 網頁瀏覽器中的運作方式的說明。An explanation of how the page works in a browser. 此範例的第一個部分是自訂控制項， `TextDisplayWebPart`。The first part of the example is a custom control, `TextDisplayWebPart`. 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 您可以明確地進行編譯，並將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您的網站 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 如需示範這兩種方法的編譯，請參閱[逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a demonstration of both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartDisplayMode_Overview#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDisplayMode_Overview/CS/textdisplaywebpart.cs#9)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartDisplayMode_Overview#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDisplayMode_Overview/VB/textdisplaywebpart.vb#9)] 程式碼範例的第二個部分是參考標準 ASP.NET Web 網頁內控制``項目，以便控制會包裝與控制項以及指定在執行階段的基本 Web 組件的功能。The second part of the code example is a Web page that references a standard ASP.NET control within an `` element, so that the control is wrapped with a control and given basic Web Parts functionality at run time. 頁面也會參考`TextDisplayWebPart`內控制``元素，其示範終端使用者的能力，以切換到目錄模式，並將控制項加入至頁面。The page also references the `TextDisplayWebPart` control within an `` element, which demonstrates the end user's ability to switch to catalog mode and add controls to the page. 這個頁面也包含``元素，其可讓使用者編輯控制項中包含``當頁面處於編輯模式。The page also includes an `` element, which enables users to edit the controls contained in the `` when the page is in edit mode. 接近頁面頂端會`register`自訂控制項和使用者控制項的另一個指示詞。Near the top of the page are a `register` directive for the custom control and another one for the user control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartDisplayMode_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDisplayMode_Overview/CS/WebPartDisplayModecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartDisplayMode_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDisplayMode_Overview/VB/WebPartDisplayModevb.aspx#1)] 程式碼範例的第三個部分是使用者控制項，可讓使用者在網頁上切換顯示模式。The third part of the code example is a user control that enables users to switch display modes on a Web page. 將這個控制項的原始程式碼儲存在名為 DisplayModeMenuCS.ascx 或 DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx （根據哪些語言您使用的程式碼範例），檔案並將其放在網頁上的相同目錄。Save the source code for this control in a file named DisplayModeMenuCS.ascx or DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx (depending on which language you use for the code example), and put it in the same directory as the Web page. 更多詳細此控制項中顯示模式和原始碼的說明，請參閱本主題[逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上顯示的模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For more details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see the topic [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartDisplayMode_Overview#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDisplayMode_Overview/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#5)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartDisplayMode_Overview#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDisplayMode_Overview/VB/displaymodemenuvb.ascx#5)] 當您載入瀏覽器中的時，您可以使用**顯示模式**顯示模式切換至不同的下拉式清單控制項。When you load the page in a browser, you can use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch to different display modes. 若要編輯控制項，請選取**編輯**下拉式清單控制項中。To edit controls, select **Edit** in the drop-down list control. 若要編輯特定的控制項，公開其動詞命令功能表按一下控制項的標題列中的箭號，然後按一下**編輯**動詞命令功能表中。To edit a specific control, expose its verbs menu by clicking the arrow in the control's title bar, and then clicking **Edit** in the verbs menu. 當控制項處於編輯模式時，此頁面加入的編輯控制項可讓您變更編輯的控制項的外觀和版面配置。When a control is in edit mode, the editing controls added to this page enable you to change the edited control's appearance and layout. 當您完成時，選取**瀏覽**中**顯示模式**頁面返回正常檢視下拉式清單控制項。When you are finished, select **Browse** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to return the page to a normal view. 若要將控制項加入頁面中，切換到目錄模式。To add controls to the page, switch to catalog mode. 請注意，您可以使用**顯示模式**下拉式清單控制項，或按一下頁面底部附近的按鈕。Notice that you can either use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control, or click the button near the bottom of the page. 內嵌程式碼`Button1_Click`方法將示範如何以程式設計方式變更顯示模式。The inline code for the `Button1_Click` method demonstrates how to change display modes programmatically. 當您位於目錄模式時，您可以加入自訂`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項加入網頁。While you are in catalog mode, you can add the custom `TextDisplayWebPart` control to the page.

para.span: 開發人員可以衍生自類別來建立自訂顯示模式。

span.span: Developers can derive from the class to create custom display modes.

para.span: 若要讓自訂可用 Web 組件頁面上，您也必須衍生自類別，並覆寫其方法。

span.span: To make a custom available on a Web Parts page, you would also need to derive from the class, and override its method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string name) cil managed

span.span: The name of the display mode.

summary.span: 初始化顯示模式名稱的值。

span.span: Initializes a value for the name of the display mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A類別是抽象的因為永遠不會建立物件。A object is never created because the class is abstract. 在執行階段，控制使用類別，如基底類別，以建立物件的每個不同的網頁顯示模式。At run time, the control uses the class as the base class to create objects for each of the various page display modes.

span.span: The parameter is .

para.span: 如果您是衍生自類別來建立自訂的顯示模式中，您必須呼叫基底建構函式，並傳遞給字串，包含自訂的顯示模式的名稱在類別宣告中。

span.span: If you derive from the class to create a custom display mode, in your class declaration you must call the base constructor and pass to it a string containing the name of the custom display mode.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property AllowPageDesign As Boolean
public: virtual property bool AllowPageDesign { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，判斷當網頁為特定顯示模式時，使用者是否可以變更 Web 組件頁面的配置。

span.span: Gets a value that determines whether users can change the layout of a Web Parts page when the page is in a certain display mode.

value.span: 如果使用者可以變更網頁配置，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if users can change the page layout; otherwise, .
The default is .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property AssociatedWithToolZone As Boolean
public: virtual property bool AssociatedWithToolZone { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，表示特定顯示模式是否與衍生自 類別的類別關聯。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether a certain display mode is associated with a class that derives from the class.

value.span: 如果顯示模式與 類別關聯，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the display mode is associated with a class; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當 Web 組件頁面輸入的顯示模式其屬性設定為`true`、控制解譯，表示相關聯的類別衍生自類別，而該額外的使用者介面 (UI) 項目需要顯示。When a Web Parts page enters a display mode whose property is set to `true`, the control interprets that to mean that an associated class derives from the class, and that additional user interface (UI) elements need to be displayed. 比方說，當網頁進入編輯模式，包含 UI 項目進行編輯 Web 組件控制項的特殊區域會出現在頁面上。For example, when a page enters edit mode, special zones that contain UI elements for editing Web Parts controls appear on the page. 這種行為都可能因為上的屬性值欄位設定為`true`。This behavior is made possible because the property value on the field is set to `true`.

para.span: 類別衍生自必須覆寫基底類別，以建立自訂的顯示模式屬性，就可以設定其值。

span.span: Classes that derive from the base class to create custom display modes must override the property in order to set its value.

param.name: webPartManager
param.span: 目前網頁上的 控制項執行個體。

span.span: The control instance on the current page.

summary.span: 取得值，表示網頁為特定顯示模式時，使用者是否可以個人化網頁。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether users can personalize a page while the page is in a certain display mode.

returns.span: 如果使用者可以個人化網頁，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if users can personalize a page; otherwise, .
The default is .

returns.span: 不過，當 設為 ，並且無法個人化網頁時，則預設將為 。

span.span: However, when is set to , and personalization is disabled on the page, the default will be .

span.span: Gets the name of a display mode.

public: virtual property bool RequiresPersonalization { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，表示特定顯示模式是否需要可以個人化才能啟動。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether a particular display mode requires personalization to be enabled.

value.span: 指示是否需要個人化的布林值。

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether personalization is required.
The default is .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property ShowHiddenWebParts As Boolean
public: virtual property bool ShowHiddenWebParts { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，表示是否應該顯示 屬性設為 的控制項。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether controls that have their property set to should be displayed.

value.span: 指示是否應該顯示隱藏控制項的布林值。

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether hidden controls should be displayed.
The default is .
